dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: Lali-ho there-ho, Forename. You'll be pleased to hear another recording device has arrived.

dialogue.name: GLAGG
dialogue.text: I know what you're up to! Oh yes, I can see through your ruse!

dialogue.name: GLAGG
dialogue.text: You pretend to be a friend while spreadin' vile rumors about me behind my back! Well, you're not goin' to drive me out of my own village! I'd rather die beardless and dry, you hear me!? Beardless and dry!

dialogue.name: GLAGG
dialogue.text: Unnngh... Why am I... What am I doin'?

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: Well, it seems the visit I paid Glagg the other day backfired. Hard to tell if trying to reach out to him is better than not doing anything...

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: But that's enough about Glagg─let's talk about cheerier things.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: Owing to everyone's hard work, the village is starting to look like itself again.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: This had the effect of inspiring another one of us to volunteer to help. The fellow's been wanting to speak with you, so let me call him over.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: Oi! Forename's here, if you wanted a word.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERC03954
dialogue.text: Chief. Forename.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERC03954
dialogue.text: I've always believed that our actions speak for us. And I've always respected them as dared to make things happen rather than sitting around. But sitting around's what I've been doing, while you labored to rebuild our village. And it made me ashamed of myself. I want to help too...if you'll have me?

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: Whatever problems we may have had in the past, having more comrades can only be a good thing. We'll let him join us, of course?

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: I'm glad we're on the same page.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERC03954
dialogue.text: Thanks for giving me a chance. I'm ready to get to work─just tell me what you need me to do.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: I'll start by having a chat with the fellow and see how he can contribute to the cause.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: Perhaps you can look in on him later? I'm sure he'd appreciate hearing from you.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A weekly quest which continues the story is now available from the decisive dwarf in Komra.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Lend your aid and help the dwarves of Komra to rebuild their home.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You obtain a message from Konogg.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The message can be viewed in your Portable Archive, which is available under Collection in the Duty section of the main menu.

dialogue.name: DWARFMASTER03671
dialogue.text: To be deleted.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERD03954
dialogue.text: To be deleted.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: To be deleted.
